jaddon.jloader

Class JLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • jaddon.jloader.JLoader

  • public class JLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an add-on for java swing

        title - String title

      • JLoader

        public JLoader(boolean visible,
               java.awt.Component c,
               boolean stringPainted,
               boolean editable,
               java.lang.String borderTitle,
               java.lang.String labelTitle,
               java.lang.String title,
               boolean buttons,
               boolean lang_b)
        Constructs the JLoader object with complete new values
        Parameters:
        visible - Boolean frame visibility
        c - Component where it is relative to
        stringPainted - Boolean if the progressbar should be painted with text
        editable - Boolean if the textarea should be editable
        borderTitle - String title from the border
        labelTitle - String title from the label
        title - String title
        buttons - Boolean True if the buttons should be shown, False if not
        lang_b - Boolen True if the system language should be used, False if not
